description: It’s easy to make this succulent roast lamb with homemade mint sauce. This juicy rosemary and garlic lamb roast will be a hit with the whole family.
keywords: Roast lamb,Roast,Seafood free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Dairy free,Potato,Peanut free
name: Garlic & Rosemary Lamb Roast With Fresh Mint Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 clove large garlic, cut into 12 slices
1 sprig rosemary, cut into 12 small sprigs
1 bunch mint, leaves picked, finely chopped
500g frozen Birds Eye country harvest peas, corn and capsicum

recipeInstructions.text: Place lamb in a roasting pan. Rub lamb with 1 tbs oil and season. Using a small, sharp knife, make 12 small cuts in top of lamb. Insert 1 garlic slice and 1 rosemary sprig into each cut. Cook lamb according to packet instructions. Stand, loosely covered with foil, for 15 minutes.

Meanwhile, once lamb has been in oven for 30 minutes, place potato on a baking paper-lined baking tray. Drizzle with remaining oil. Bake for 1 hour 30 minutes or until golden and crisp. Season with pepper.

Meanwhile, place vinegar, sugar and salt in a small saucepan over medium-low heat. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until sugar and salt have dissolved. Transfer vinegar mixture to a bowl. Stir in mint. Season with pepper.
Cook frozen vegetables according to packet instructions. Slice lamb and serve with potato, vegetables and mint sauce.
